prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Bass, Guitar, Reed, Drums, but without Organ.
captions:
Style 1:
This piece of music features Bass, Guitar, Reed, and Drums, but no Organ.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Bass, Guitar, Reed, and Drums, but excludes Organ.

Style 3:
This composition is comprised of Bass, Guitar, Reed, and Drums, but not Organ.
